verses.verse: Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in years; <S%H3117><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou <S%H859><s%> art old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in years, <S%H3117><s%> and there remaineth <S%H7604><s%> yet very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to be possessed. <S%H3423><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> that yet remaineth: <S%H7604><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the borders <S%H1552><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Geshuri, <S%H1651><s%>

From <S%H4480><s%> Sihor, <S%H7883><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> which is counted <S%H2803><s%> to the Canaanite: <S%H3669><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> the Gazathites, <S%H5841><s%> and the Ashdothites, <S%H796><s%> the Eshkalonites, <S%H832><s%> the Gittites, <S%H1663><s%> and the Ekronites; <S%H6139><s%> also the Avites: <S%H5757><s%>

From the south, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8486><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and Mearah <S%H4632><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is beside the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Aphek, <S%H663><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the borders <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites: <S%H567><s%>

And the land <S%H776><s%> of the Giblites, <S%H1382><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> toward the sunrising, <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> from Baal-gad <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1171><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the entering <S%H935><s%> into Hamath. <S%H2574><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the hill country <S%H2022><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Misrephoth-maim, <S%H4956><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> them will I <S%H595><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> divide thou it by lot <S%H5307><s%> unto the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%>

With <S%H5973><s%> whom the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them, beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> even as <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them;

From Aroer, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6177><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the river, <S%H5158><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H4334><s%> of Medeba <S%H4311><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Dibon; <S%H1769><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

And Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and Maachathites, <S%H4602><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan <S%H1316><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Salcah; <S%H5548><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and in Edrei, <S%H154><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3499><s%> of the giants: <S%H7497><s%> for these did Moses <S%H4872><s%> smite, <S%H5221><s%> and cast them out. <S%H3423><s%>

Nevertheless the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> expelled <S%H3423><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Geshurites, <S%H1651><s%> nor the Maachathites: <S%H4602><s%> but the Geshurites <S%H1650><s%> and the Maachathites <S%H4601><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> the sacrifices of the LORD God of Israel made by fire <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H3478><s%> are their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he said <S%H1696><s%> unto them.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> inheritance according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> from Aroer, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6177><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the river, <S%H5158><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain <S%H4334><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> Medeba; <S%H4311><s%>

Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her cities <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the plain; <S%H4334><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and Bamoth-baal, <S%H1120><s%> and Beth-baal-meon, <S%H1010><s%>
And Jahazah, <S%H3096><s%> and Kedemoth, <S%H6932><s%> and Mephaath, <S%H4158><s%>
And Kirjathaim, <S%H7156><s%> and Sibmah, <S%H7643><s%> and Zareth-shahar <S%H6890><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%>
And Beth-peor, <S%H1047><s%> and Ashdoth-pisgah, <S%H798><s%> and Beth-jeshimoth, <S%H1020><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H4334><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> <S%H853><s%> Evi, <S%H189><s%> and Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> and Zur, <S%H6698><s%> and Hur, <S%H2354><s%> and Reba, <S%H7254><s%> which were dukes <S%H5257><s%> of Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> dwelling <S%H3427><s%> in the country. <S%H776><s%>

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor, <S%H1160><s%> the soothsayer, <S%H7080><s%> did the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> among <S%H413><s%> them that were slain <S%H2491><s%> by them.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof. This <S%H2063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> and the villages <S%H2691><s%> thereof.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> inheritance unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> even unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Aroer <S%H6177><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Rabbah; <S%H7237><s%>

And from Heshbon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2809><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Ramath-mizpeh, <S%H7434><s%> and Betonim; <S%H993><s%> and from Mahanaim <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4266><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Debir; <S%H1688><s%>

And in the valley, <S%H6010><s%> Beth-aram, <S%H1027><s%> and Beth-nimrah, <S%H1039><s%> and Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and Zaphon, <S%H6829><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and his border, <S%H1366><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> inheritance unto the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> and this was <S%H1961><s%> the possession of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> by their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> from Mahanaim, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4266><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> threescore <S%H8346><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

And half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and Ashtaroth, <S%H6252><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> were pertaining unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> even to the one half <S%H2677><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> by their families. <S%H4940><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the countries which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> did distribute for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> on the other side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> by Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>

But unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> any inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he said <S%H1696><s%> unto them.
